| 4 | AI-based conversion optimization | Webinars | Educates potential clients like digital marketing managers about the benefits and processes of AI-based conversion optimization. | "Maximize your ROI and optimize your website design with AI-based conversion optimization." | Educational, interactive |
|  |  | Google Ads | Targets specific keywords related to conversion optimization, reaching clients looking for ways to improve their website's performance. |  | Targeted, search-focused |
| 5 | AI-driven SEO recommendations and auditing | SEO-focused blog posts | Demonstrates expertise and showcases the benefits of AI-driven SEO recommendations and auditing to SEO specialists. | "Boost your online visibility with AI-driven SEO recommendations and auditing." | Educational, engaging |
|  |  | YouTube Tutorials | Provides visual, engaging content that teaches potential clients about the value of AI-driven SEO recommendations and auditing. |  | Engaging, visual |
| 6 | AI-powered social media management | Social Media Influencer Partnerships | Collaborates with influencers in the marketing and social media space to showcase the benefits of AI-powered social media management. | "Streamline your social media management with our AI-powered solution." | Influencer-focused, engaging |
|  |  | Instagram Ads | Targets social media managers on a platform where they are already active, showcasing the service's ability to improve social media performance. |  | Targeted, visually appealing |
| 7 | AI-powered |  |  |  |  |
